title: Are some people born evil? - Quora

response.answer_text: We are all born with a sinful nature because of Adam and Eve.  They committed sin against God.  We can ask God for forgiveness for our sins, and then we will be Born-Again with the Holy Spirit inside of us.  We will go to heaven to be with God since Jesus paid the price for our sins when He gave His life for us.
evil does not exist in reality but only in the minds of those ignorant of how reality actually functions, judging reality by false alternatives.

I don't believe anyone is born evil. I do believe that some people are born *broken*. They have cognitive or emotional defects that make it impossible for them to experience empathy.  I think those conditions are pretty rare, however, and that most people who behave in ways we call evil were twisted and warped by the circumstances of their upbringing.

An even tougher question is "What is evil"?  Volumes have been written on that subject alone.  Personally, no, I don't think people are born evil.  I lean more towards the belief that people become evil.

Two points view.1. We are not, we are tablula rasa when we are born, that's why we are all equal.2. We are born evil, because we are a part of the universe that is driven by the will that is cold and indifferent.
No, I don't think so, but wrong parenting can make him or her evil though.
